name: BarRaiser
description:
BarRaiser is an Intelligent Interview Platform leading the charge in revolutionizing the interviewing process. As a B2B SaaS provider, our vision is to create a seamless and future-ready interviewing experience for Hiring Managers, HR Leaders, Recruiters and Chief Talent Officers.
 
 Our innovative suite of products - the Interview Co-pilot Tool, Structured Interview Planning Tool, Interview Intelligence, and Video Interview Platform - is designed to enhance every facet of the recruiting journey. With cutting-edge technologies like AI-driven interview structuring, real-time feedback, and AI interview highlights, we are transcending traditional boundaries in interviewing.
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Redefine Excellence
ShortDescription: BarRaiser is an Intelligent Interview Platform leading the charge in revolutionizing the interviewing process.

Highlights.name: Structured Interviews
Highlights.description: Enhance hiring efficiency with the help of BarRaiser’s structured interviewing tool that reduces bias in interviewing

Highlights.name: Interview Co-Pilot
Highlights.description: Transforming hiring by guiding interviewers to identify and select top-tier talent effectively

Highlights.name: Real-time Feedback
Highlights.description: Use BarRaiser's Interview assistant to allow your Interviewers fill feedback during the interview

enhanced_description: BarRaiser is an Intelligent Interview Platform and B2B SaaS provider that revolutionizes the interviewing process by offering a seamless, future-ready experience. It serves Hiring Managers, HR Leaders, Recruiters, and Chief Talent Officers across small, large, and global enterprises. The platform's innovative suite of products, including the Interview Co-pilot Tool, Structured Interview Planning Tool, Interview Intelligence, and Video Interview Platform, is designed to enhance every facet of the recruiting journey. Utilizing cutting-edge AI-driven technologies, BarRaiser facilitates structured interviews to reduce bias, provides real-time feedback to interviewers, and generates AI interview highlights to guide the selection of top-tier talent. This comprehensive solution aids in efficient hiring, improved interviewing processes, and cost reduction.
key_use_cases: Guiding interviewers to identify top talent (Interview Co-pilot)
Reducing bias in interviewing through structured tools
Identifying and selecting top-tier talent effectively
competitive_advantages: Intelligent Interview Platform leading the charge in revolutionizing interviewing
Structured Interview Planning Tool for bias reduction
Interview Co-pilot Tool for guiding interviewers to select top talent
roi_benefits: Identify and select top-tier talent effectively
